channel.title: Factual on What I talk about when I don't talk about me
channel.description: Recent content in Factual on What I talk about when I don't talk about me

item.title: Location search using Factual and interactive maps using Leaflet
item.description: Leaflet is a popular javascript library for making interactive maps. Don’t know how to code in js? No problem, thanks to Ramnath Vaidyanathan, you can now use rCharts to do it in R! Now that we have R Shiny, it just seems a natural thing to combine the two together to make Shiny apps for interactive maps. If that doesn’t motivate you, take a look at these cool examples and roll up your sleeves and make one yourself (example1, example2)!
